ConfigurationOption.Value: select assetnum, description, parent, location, status, isrunning, failurecode, priority, binnum, itemnum, serialnum, assettag, vendor, manufacturer, installdate, glaccount, classstructureid, siteid, assetuid from asset where status = 'OPERATING' and assetnum not like 'G%' and assetnum not like 'K%' and assetnum not like 'E%' order by assetnum

Struct._value: := query( 'Asset Downtime', 'Downtime Code', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site} and endstatusid is null' )
:= query( 'Asset Meter Readings', 'Asset', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site}' ) is not null
:= query( 'Spare Parts', 'Asset', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site}' ) is not null
:= query( 'Specifications', 'Asset', 'Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site}') is not null
:= query( "Work Order Lookup", "Asset", "Asset = ${Asset} and Site = ${Site} and (Status = 'COMP' or Status = 'CLOSE' ) " ) is not null
IsInsert() or IsModified("Serial Number") or ${Serial Number} is null
IsInsert() or IsModified("Asset Tag") or ${Asset Tag} is null
